SELECT TB.ID_BULLETIN /* 자료실번호 */ , TB.DS_TITLE /* 제목 */ , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_ATTACH A , SYS_ATTACH_LINK L WHERE A.ATTACH_ID = L.ATTACH_ID AND L.BIZ_TP= 'BBS' AND L.BIZ_KEY = TB.ID_BULLETIN) AS CNT_ATTACH /* 첨부여부 */ , TB.CNT_INQUIRY /* 조회수 */ , TO_CHAR(TB.DT_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT_REG /* 등록일자 */ , TB.ID_REG_DEPT /* 등록부서 */ , SD.DEPT_NM AS NM_REG_DEPT , TB.ID_REG_EMP /* 등록자 */ , SU.USER_NM AS NM_REG_EMP FROM TBS_BULLETIN TB LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER SU ON TB.ID_REG_EMP = SU.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_DEPARTMENT SD ON TB.ID_REG_DEPT = SD.DEPT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TB.TP_BULLETIN = '02'
AND TB.DT_REG >= TO_DATE (#{DT_REG_START} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 기간검색(FROM) */
AND TB.DT_REG <= TO_DATE (#{DT_REG_END} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 기간검색(TO) */
AND TB.ID_REG_EMP LIKE '%' || #{ID_REG_EMP} || '%'
AND (TB.DS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{DS_TITLE_CONTENT} ||'%' OR TB.DS_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{DS_TITLE_CONTENT} ||'%') /* 제목+내용 */
AND TB.FG_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY TB.ID_BULLETIN DESC
mapper.select: SELECT TB.ID_BULLETIN , TB.TP_CATEGORY , TB.DS_TITLE , TB.DS_CONTENT , TB.DS_CONT_DTL , TB.DT_REG , TB.ID_REG_DEPT , SD.DEPT_NM AS NM_REG_DEPT , TB.ID_REG_EMP , SU.USER_NM AS NM_REG_EMP , TB.DT_UPT , TB.ID_UPT_DEPT , SDU.DEPT_NM AS NM_UPT_DEPT , TB.ID_UPT_EMP , SUU.USER_NM AS NM_UPT_EMP FROM TBS_BULLETIN TB LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_DEPARTMENT SD ON TB.ID_REG_DEPT = SD.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER SU ON TB.ID_REG_EMP = SU.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_DEPARTMENT SDU ON TB.ID_UPT_DEPT = SDU.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER SUU ON TB.ID_UPT_EMP = SUU.USER_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND TB.TP_BULLETIN = '02' /* (01:FAQ 02:자료실) */ AND TB.ID_BULLETIN = #{ID_BULLETIN} /* 게시판ID */
SELECT ROLE_ID FROM AP_ROLE_GROUP WHERE USER_ID = #{user.id} GROUP BY ROLE_ID
